meanings.definition: A fossil mollusk with a spiral shell.
meanings.sent1: The scientist found an ammonite fossil on the beach.
meanings.sent2: Ammonites are often used by researchers to learn about ancient marine life.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the tiny ammonite fossil was a magical seashell.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of ammonite fossils spiraled like a staircase to the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details on the ancient ammonite shell fascinated the visitors at the museum.

meanings.definition: A type of extinct marine animal.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a large model of an ammonite to show visitors.
meanings.sent2: Ammonites were once abundant in the oceans millions of years ago.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon depicted an animated talking ammonite as a character.
meanings.sent4: The ancient legend spoke of an enormous ammonite ruling the sea.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the diverse shapes and sizes of different types of ammonites.

meanings.definition: A creature that lived in the sea millions of years ago.
meanings.sent1: Children love to imagine swimming with the friendly ammonite creatures.
meanings.sent2: Ammonites were part of the prehistoric underwater ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The storybook featured a time-traveling adventure with an ammonite as the guide.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, she floated through the ocean riding on the back of a giant ammonite.
meanings.sent5: The documentary captured the beauty of the ancient underwater world where ammonites thrived.
